greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle where g.f. satisfies: A(x,y) = 1 + x*A(x,y)^2 + x*y*A(x,y)^3, read by rows.
comment: Row sums = A027307 (paths from (0,0) to (3n,0) in steps (2,1),(1,2),(1,-1)).
link: Jian Zhou, Fat and Thin Emergent Geometries of Hermitian One-Matrix Models, arXiv:1810.03883 [math-ph], 2018.
formula: Main diagonal: T(n, n) = A001764(n) (ternary tree numbers).
Antidiagonal sums = A001002 (number of dissections of a polygon).
G.f. of row n: 1/y^(n+1) * d^(n-1)/dy^(n-1) (y^2+y^3)^n / n!. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Jun 22 2012
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := Binomial[2n + k, n + 2k]*Binomial[n + 2k, k]/(n + k + 1);
Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 8}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 27 2019 *)
program: (PARI) Dy(n, F)=local(D=F); for(i=1, n, D=deriv(D,y)); D
T(n,k)=local(A=1); A=1+sum(m=1, n+1, x^m/y^(m+1) * Dy(m-1, (y^2+y^3)^m/m!)) +x*O(x^n)+y*O(y^k); polcoeff(polcoeff(A, n,x),k,y)
x='x; y='y; z='z; Fxyz = 1 - z + x*z^2 + x*y*z^3;
z1 = z0 - subst(Fxyz, z, z0)/subst(deriv(Fxyz, z), z, z0);
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Mar 30 2005
